text: American singer Steve Grand has released two studio albums, four singles and two promotional singles. His debut album All American Boy was released on March 23, 2015. Grand released his second album Not The End Of Me independently on his own label on July 6, 2018.https://itunes.apple.com/ca/album/not-the-end-of-me/1394669927 The album debut in the top 10 of the Billboard independent chart at the number 10 position on July 21, 2018. https://www.billboard.com/charts/independent- albums/2018-07-21 ==Albums== ===Studio albums=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- !
